sentences.en: After work they made a hearty meal in the worker's canteen.
sentences.cn: 工作完了,他们在工人食堂饱餐了一顿.

sentences.en: Finally he decided that the safest place was the canteen.
sentences.cn: 最后他定好,最最安全的地方依然是食堂.

sentences.en: He always brings a canteen with him on a hike.
sentences.cn: 他作徒步旅行时总是带着水壶.

sentences.en: He looked round the canteen again.
I'm pleased to see that they're ringing the changes in the staff canteen. The new menus are much more interesting.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴职工食堂在换花样, 新菜单比以前有吸引力多了.

sentences.en: Lunch in the hot, crowded, noise - filled canteen was torment.
sentences.cn: 食堂里拥挤酷热, 喧嚣一片,吃中饭简直是受罪.

sentences.en: Partitions provided a segregation between the smoking and non - smoking areas of the canteen.
sentences.cn: 隔断把餐厅分成了吸烟区和 非吸烟 区.

sentences.en: Rennie had eaten his supper in the canteen.
sentences.cn: 伦尼已在食堂吃过晚饭。

sentences.en: Rennie had eaten his tea in the canteen.
sentences.cn: 伦尼已经在餐厅吃过茶点了。

sentences.en: The canteen was decked out with Christmas decorations.
sentences.cn: 食堂装点着圣诞节饰品.

sentences.en: The professor sometimes dines at the student canteen.
sentences.cn: 那位教授有时在学生餐厅用膳.

sentences.en: The students are at loggerheads with the college over the price of food in the canteen.
sentences.cn: 学生们就食堂饭菜的价格问题和学院争执不休.

sentences.en: The survey found a wide variation in the prices charged for canteen food.
sentences.cn: 调查发现食堂饭菜的价格相差很大。

sentences.en: They sent up to the canteen for some lunch.
sentences.cn: 他们随即通知临时餐厅弄些午饭吃.

sentences.en: This is a much frequented canteen.
sentences.cn: 这是一家就餐人数很多的食堂.

trans.tran_en: a place in a factory, school etc where meals are provided, usually quite cheaply
